hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Transition Momentum Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market transitions from NEUTRAL to BEAR regime (confirmed by regime model), a sharp initial sell-off in BTC (≥8% drop over 3 days) will be followed by a mean-reversion bounce of 3-5% within the next 5 trading days, as oversold conditions trigger short-term covering.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Initial regime transitions often overextend due to panic selling and forced liquidations. In BEAR regimes, volatility clusters create oversold bounces even within downtrends. The 3-5% bounce target captures typical dead-cat bounce magnitude before continuation.
entry_conditions: Regime model confirms NEUTRAL → BEAR transition within last 24 hours
BTC price below 20-day moving average by ≥5%

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% gain from entry price OR 3-day holding period

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If mean reversion bounce fails to materialize (price continues straight down without ≥3% counter-trend move) in >60% of historical NEUTRAL→BEAR transitions.
